documents.document: [#AnkhBot R2] Addressing some of your concerns, we updated our blog <3 Have a great weekend! https://t.co/ZHlD9oREPZ ^M
[#AnkhBot R2] Great news guys @YouTube just increased our API limit! we upped playlist importing from 50 to 200 songs, Enjoy more tunes 🎶!^M
[#AnkhBot R2 - 1.0.2.0] Scripting, UI and General stuff. The update is finally live! https://t.co/AoHTqndSUv
[#AnkhBot R2] LIVE in few minutes for the showcasing of the new update and patch notes! https://t.co/X55mXlLZqa ^M
[#AnkhBot R2] Twitch just updated their API! so we added a last minute touch. can you tell what it is? 👀^M https://t.co/C0DuVrF0Zg
[#AnkhBot R2] Hello everyone There will be a show and tell release tomorrow: 2 PM ET | 11 AM PT |6 PM UTC on https://t.co/2dtXD06FOh #RT ^M
[#AnkhBot R2] A small spoiler for our lovely community. Thank you for being patient on this <3 more info here : https://t.co/i6mw1KGIYd ^M https://t.co/uAGrZOahtB
Our team needs some information from you, Survey time! As an affiliate how many subscribers do you have? and do you have high tier subs?^M
[#AnkhBot R2] we're almost done on songrequest revamp, what do you guys think? also video quality options and disabling video!^@xM0MOx https://t.co/LDMxJfU0Zk
[#AnkhBot R2] we're putting the final touches on our new build to give it a more modern/dynamic look! got an idea? @ me 👀^M https://t.co/xLKfLnOIH2
RT @AnkhHeart: @xM0MOx Happy Birthday! https://t.co/Bn0QlWAhpD
[#AnkhBot R2] Timer groups and timers for the game you're playing! ( it will only post when you're playing that GAME ) coming soon™!^M https://t.co/qZpOXwrJIB
[#AnkhBot R2] Command costs and command groups are coming soon! Thank you for suggesting it, hope you guys are having a lovely weekend!^M https://t.co/7CKrXk9Qah
[#AnkhBot R2] Warning! Bot not launching anymore? Microsoft .Net 4.7 is corrupted! Solution Listed: https://t.co/al3iqAc7QL RT! ^A
[#AnkhBot R2] did you hear the news?! Tab to auto complete emotes and username will be on our next build! reply with more ideas here!😍^M https://t.co/sFGJdEFulG
#AnkhBotR2 Chat scale is coming to our next build with the ability to go up to 200%!!! for more suggestions tweet reply below^M https://t.co/EVQyLh6BDd
#AnkhBotR2 You guys asked for autohost update and we listened, keep tweeting us ideas <3 also giveaway ticket purchase change incoming^M https://t.co/VfynHdiTjI
#AnkhBotR2 Progress being made on our scripts tab is almost complete! more info in #AnkhBot-Spoilers on https://t.co/i6mw1KGIYd ^M https://t.co/FKxIdigwJ0
#AnkhBotR2 we might be needing another scroll bar in our connections soon? 👀 OBS Remote coming soon™!^M https://t.co/MqGhZNcftR
Oops forgot to say that you can make it responsive! just like that, nice and easy on the side of your stream and not full screen >.>^M https://t.co/FR9jdCMZ4z
#AnkhBotR2 Did anyone say polls overlay?! we'd love to hear more of your amazing ideas! thank you for the amazing feedback this past week!^M https://t.co/wq9R5P5Qea
Currency display in chat and on overlay! #ComingSoon™! reply with more ideas? #RT ^M https://t.co/IYwqGGU4F2
most of the stuff people want are being worked on! as for the reported bugs it'll be fixed in the next patch. keep them coming people!^M
What's a feature you want to see in the future? something game changing for AnkhBot? tweet us your ideas! https://t.co/gTKgYF2Hfx
For those experiencing issues with #AnkhBot it seems that Twitch is having Chat, API & Loading issues, be patient. https://t.co/TdYlPbBg9l
